document_data.name: Eldath's Tranquility
document_data.mainbody: '''''Eldath's tranquility''''' was a [[divine magic]] [[spell]] available to worshipers of [[Eldath]], the Mother Guardian of Groves.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell created an aura of peace and calm around the caster. When an animal encountered this aura, it saw the caster as friendly and nonthreatening. The spell was often used to calm an angry or frightened animal.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Somatic component|somatic]] and [[Verbal component|verbal]] components, this spell required [[material component]]s, the caster's holy symbol and a piece of food.
